website_summaries.verdict: Energy efficiency and an affordable price tag draw customers to this unit.
pros: Minimal energy consumption separates this unit from its power-hungry competitors
cons: Cooks slowly, making it a poor choice for a quick meal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 10 minutes, then burned my fuse!
customer_reviews.text: I tested it with some meat on the highest temperature for 10 minutes. My initial impression was that the fan sound is decent and the bowl is large. However, after turning it off it wouldn't come back on. I let it cool down and tried again and it burned and died completely... From the look of it, this thing is clearly hit and miss. Unless you are fine with a low quality potentially junky device, do not buy this thing. And by the way, the warranty on it seems useless. You have to show that you have used it properly, and shipping costs are on you.
customer_reviews.author: Roshan

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: I have this convention oven to my mother as a Christmas gift. Today she used it for the first time and after 40 min it smelled like something was burning, the plug was so hot that I needed a towel to remove it. The pictures talk for itself. Was I supposed to buy something to plug it in?
customer_reviews.author: Bethsy

customer_reviews.title: Updated review BROKE AFTER SIX MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Bought this in November and it is now June. With light usage. Maybe once or twice a week and it already broke. The heat doesn’t go on anymore This oven is amazing. I use it for everything almost in my everyday life. Trust me it’s mhch better than your typical open door oven. The food cooks great and evenly and the glass bowl is very easy to clean. My only concern is cleaning the inner compartments of the lid. I’ve yet to attempt it had any need to right now. But will update when that comes around.
customer_reviews.author: Huan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item!  Note: no customer support is avalible!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several convection ovens in the past.This by far the worst unit.The cooking time is about double other units ,it will not brown, Timer mal fuctioned after 6 months. the included 3 legged rack is a joke.Chrome plating gone after 8 months. You cannot remove anything from the rack without tipping rack. don't let this poor unit spoil your take on using convection cook tops. I use my every day and rely on it. Spend the money and get a good one!
customer_reviews.author: thatgirl815

customer_reviews.title: returned twice - unsure if will ever get full refund
customer_reviews.text: We so wanted this oven to work. The first one arrived with the bottom frame cracked. We did not even turn it on. We got a new replacement that worked for a week, we thought it was perfect. Then it started making scary sounds and seemed unsafe. We wanted to try again for a replacement, but didn't seem to be an option, we returned, but never received a refund. We would give it a third try if the company would send another one.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Licciardi

customer_reviews.title: ... have had this machine over a year and I love it. It's awesome for reheating pizza
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine over a year and I love it. It's awesome for reheating pizza, cooking bacon, anything that is premade like tyson chicken strips, or corn dogs. I've never done anything major in it like a whole chicken. I don't have an air fryer (but I want one) but I bet this is very similar to one. the lid is pretty heavy and you want to be careful where you place it when you take it off to remove your food. i have my crock pot sitting right never to it so I set the lit on top of it when I am done cooking (the crock pot lid is flipped over so it's handle is inside.)
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: I prefer these over the halogen ovens
customer_reviews.text: my first one lasted 3 years. then i switched to tayama because it was cheaper at the time, that one lasted 2 years. now i'm back to oyama again, so far my current one been a year and still going. i've had good luck with these inexpensive turbo ovens. I only expect it to last 2 to 3 years of use, but I use it multiple times everyday so it's worth it to me. I've had bad luck with nuwaves. i'm not the only one, i've pretty much converted everyone i know to switch to these types after their nuwave breaks.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love my Oyama TRO-110C Turbo Convection Oven. I've had it about two years now. It cooks steaks, salmon, chicken tenders, and reheated pizza up so good. I use this oven in the summer so I don't heat up my whole kitchen. I love putting on two frozen steaks for 10 minutes at 400 degrees. They are so tender and juicy. I also love the glass bowl the infrared sits on. I used to have a nu-wave oven that I really loved, but the dome (which is acrylic) would crack every six months, forcing me to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 units like this over the past 15 years and they all worked well the only thing i could say bad about this unit is the little safety they built into the handle which must be pushed as you lower the handle to turn it on. It is very fragile and i'm sure it will in fact break at some point other than that it's as advertised and cooks great.
customer_reviews.author: William R

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shape and how easy the bowl cleans up (although the glass bow is heavy). Is useful since I don't have to heat up the whole kitchen by using the oven. Unfortunately this is not as good as the Nuwave I used to have since it does not cook from frozen....If it did cook from frozen, considering that the bowl is nice and clear and doesn't perpetually crack like the Nuwave I used to have, I would have definitely paid more...
customer_reviews.author: Irine

customer_reviews.title: Good convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have had occasion to have used several similar convection ovens. This good but not the best but it isn't the worst either. Big plus is the glass bowl (compare to plastic Nuwave) it his easy to keep clean in the dishwasher and can be used for mixing. On the negative side the steel cooking grids are thin and weak. There is also an annoying safety switch that I believe is weak and prone to break and failure. Look carefully at similar ovens but at the price it isn't bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: TURBO COOKER 12/17/2017- 12/1/2019 REST AND PEACE.  Shy of 2 years and finally died.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gadget. Easy to use . Made crispy chicken wings year round. I ran this product hard. Use the turbo almost 90% of daily cooking. Unit lasted about shy of close to 2 years. This is the OG of air fryers. This has been around since the 1990s. For the price of the unit its a win win.This is my second turbo i bought. Im thinking of going back to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Paris G

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this. First time I used it the fan did not work and the heater would not stay on. Returned and will not buy again. The ones we use in the Philippines takes 3!chickens. This unit was not built to last. I should have heeded the negative comments on the reviews. Amazon return process was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzo

customer_reviews.title: Don't be intimidated!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. If you use foil in the bottom, cleanup is quick! I've made chicken, steak and hamburgers. All were moist and tasty. This thing does everything. Better than the big ole black air fryer. The cookbook is not much, but the manual has some good recipies. I checked it out on youtube....
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Winland

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have gone through so many of this oven from different brand. This specific one has surpassed our expectations. It works great. Heat up fast and just super easy to use. It also comes with a stand to hold the lid, which is something that the other ovens do not provide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy this one again.
customer_reviews.text: I have been turbo broiler since in the early 70s. Aside from the one we got the 1st time that came from Japan, this one is the next best. It just kept cooking without a glitch. The only problem I have is the power light lens came off without a trace. But this thing still cook light new. I'll stay away from halogen cause they don't last, but fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Ilander525

customer_reviews.title: but has also been a great pizza oven that you can watch the progress of ...
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without this, especially for $40? I just saw the new Nu-Wave oven advertised for $160 and this does many of the same things. The only downside is the lack of available recipes, but if you are creative you can make your own. I now use this as a toaster, but has also been a great pizza oven that you can watch the progress of your pizza without heating a big oven. I have made pork chops, veggies - just about anything in here without a problem. Easy to clean glass bowl too. I have been using it for about 2-3 months and I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: grateful reader

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I returned it without even plugging it in, because it's much too large for my kitchen. Including the handles, it's 16" wide and 14" tall. Plus, it's heavy. I don't have enough cupboard and counter space for this monster. I wish they made one that is half as big.
customer_reviews.author: Costero

customer_reviews.title: NuWave vs. Oyama
customer_reviews.text: I am used to working with an older model of the NuWave. They didn't have the temperature regulator on it; so it is difficult to use the Oyama for me. I would have liked a card that stated the temp. to use and the length of time needed. I bought the Oyama instead of the NuWave because it is smaller, and much cheaper. I love the glass bowl for cleaning. It is quiet running. I'm sure that I will love the Oyama when I get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Larae A. Grotzinger

customer_reviews.title: Nu-Wave uses a sturdy plastic for the body of the oven
customer_reviews.text: I had another convection oven, a Nu-Wave, which functioned well. Compared to the Oyama TRO-110C the Nu Wave "fell short" on what I consider a MAJOR difference. Nu-Wave uses a sturdy plastic for the body of the oven. Over time this plastic discolors and mine developed a couple of cracks. This plastic body is also difficult to clean. Oyama is far superior because the body is made of sturdy heat proof glass...like pyrex. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: StephenV

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. She has used it a total of 3 times and now it is completely dead. Won't power on at all. I've tried it in multiple outlets and check to make sure the outlets were working. Nothing. Can't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: In Scotland these are quite popular but difference is. ...
customer_reviews.text: In Scotland these are quite popular but difference is.. the lid is hinged to the frame making it much easier to open & close & therefore you don't have to worry about fitting the lid into some cheap lid holder & the fear of being burnt. I haven't used this cooker as yet but shouldn't be much different than the one I used while living in Scotland.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my last one. I haven't used it to roast anything but coffee, but it is a perfect replacement for my last one. I keep it in the garage and can also use it to convection roast vegetables, chicken or fried frozen breaded fish without heating up my house. It's ideal for that.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs a lot more information
customer_reviews.text: great value, i would say it needs more info on cooking temperatures, the attached manuals are nice but incomplete, the little graphs on top are difficult to decipher, the base is very easy to clean but the lid is another story, mine is already dirty with splatter and tricky to wash because of the electrical compnents, there are no hints in the attached manuals on how to clean the lid, not sure if they have a website for more recipes or temperature/time for the most common dishes one cooks on a convection oven, aside from these "flaws" all well
customer_reviews.author: chesu

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth replacement for my original oven. It is great for baking cakes, in Bundt pans, air frying, broiling, etc. Very versatile. Is economic to use, living alone, I hated heating up a big over just for a chicken leg, piece of fish, etc. It also works great for bacon, all the grease falls to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Hot & Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I just repurchased this item May 2019 after my first purchased fail one month shy of 3 years. I bought it because the oven raised the temperature in my apartment too much. I quickly morphed into using it year round. Easy to clean. Great for baking potatoes and sweet potatoes. Heating frozen pies and baking biscuits. I like the timer so I can set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been using it this entire time, and she loves it. It cooks really quickly and the cleaning process is much faster than the oven. My mom loves making roasted pig and this oven specifically target the skin so well the skin is much crispier than if we baked it in the conventional oven. The only down point on this is that because the food is so close to the top where the heat is from, the covering gets a lot of oil stains easily, that also ends up burning every time you turn the oven back on. Therefore you have to undo the screws to really cleanse the oil stains on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as others?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about this. I used to have a Big Boss and with the Halogen light it seemed to get much hotter. I still use it daily and never use the oven and rarely the stove top. Its perfect for me. Takes up a lot of counter space so mine is on a small counter in a nook of the kitchen. None of them get 5 star reviews I notice so I guess this is about average.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Kate

customer_reviews.title: love it. use it inside. but 2nd one and it's broken after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven. love how it cooks perfectly and i can use it inside without any smoke. however, i got one from the store and it broke after a month. this one i got in 2017. lasted me 2 years. it just broke. it turns on like it's working but there's no more heat. i guess you can say 2 years is long, but not long enough to have to keep replacing your turbo oven. not sure if i want to get another one or try a different indoor grill. :(
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: The healthiest way you can cook !
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these after suffering a stroke. We have cooked everything we eat with this for several years. These take over 70% more oil out of meat than any other method of cooking.After using this for a year the doctor said the plaque in my neck arteries was shrinking ! This is the healthiest way you can cook !
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie P. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and 1 month
customer_reviews.text: 1 year and 1 month. That’s how long this oven will last you. This will be my third oven. I buy a new one every year when the previous one dies. $50 to cook my meals daily is a pretty good deal. I use it every single day. I’ve bought more expensive ovens and ovens with infrared lights and they eventually die too. Don’t waste your money on other convection ovens. They all cook the same. Cooks food from frozen, easy to clean, easy to use. The fan is a little loud but that’s about it. Ding! Dinner’s ready. Gotta go.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Oven replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 weeks and it is a very good product. I have cooked steak, vegetables, beef roasts, chicken breasts, chicken wings, frozen foods and many other products and it replaces my big oven and any deep frying. My next project will be baking a whole chicken and I am sure it will come out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Seddon

customer_reviews.title: This item is a lie.
customer_reviews.text: I have cooked french fries, chicken pizza, meat. at multiple different temperatures and times. This item is advertised as cooking food 3 times faster i cooked chicken legs for over 40 minutes and still not cooked i tried 350 degrees 450 degrees it doesn't matter. This item sucked under cooked everything pizza soggy but burnt on top doesn't matter whether its on top tack or bottom. THIS ITEM DOES NOT COOK FOOD FASTER THEY ARE LYING. iM RETURNING THIS ITEM THIS ITEM SUCKED NUTRI-WAVE SUCKS MAINSTAYS SUCKS NONE OF THEM PERFORM AS ADVERTISED.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: Basically A Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as an air fryer, Broiler, Baker etc, but it’s basically a toaster oven. Cooks everything exactly as a toaster oven would. Not the same as an air fryer which is why I gave it 4 stars. Does work good though, and it holds up to eveyday use. I’ve had it about 2-3 mo.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Mafimilia Ent.

customer_reviews.title: Would repurchase again and I have.
customer_reviews.text: Had same exact product and bought the same model again because we loved it so much. Our first one was breaking down on us but it lasted more than 5 years. Cooks quickly and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have used these type of cookers for 30 years and you can't beat them. Took this one out of the box and it is everything we wanted, but be careful, there are a lot of bad ones out there that use infrared or halogen to cook and they do not work well at all. We had to return several of them that used a different type of heat element that did not get hot enough. This model is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down after less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning everything worked as expected, but the heater died on February 16, 2018, not even after 2 months use ! Indicator light erroneously show that the unit is still working. Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Pakalan

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 so far...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to buy the NuWave oven but didn't want to buy it for its price. I found this one instead and decided to order it based on the number of positive reviews and the cost. I am really happy with this purchase. I use it often to make crispy chicken wings that taste like its been fried. It does take up a lot of counter space in my small kitchen but super easy to use versus my regular wall oven. Cleaning is easy and have bought 2 more as gifts. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best
customer_reviews.text: Big size, clear glass, easy to clean, have made every meal in this air fryer since purchased a month a go. I wish I could be a salesman for these things. Totally recommend, best priced and best functioning one out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is slower than a turtle.
customer_reviews.text: If you ever had the original Flavor Wave Turbo you will be very disappointed. It has a range type Heat element that the limit trips between the set points. It works but it is slow so I'm going to look for the original. The old flavor wave after 10 years is still working but starting looking ruff.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I love this convection oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this convection oven! It's super big, crazy easy to use (I literally just season my chicken/steak/fish and drop it in), it cooks fast, and the results are always tender! Very easy to clean, and I love that it comes with multiple racks, so I can drop in my veggies when the cooker has about 10 minutes left! It comes with some helpful tongs to remove the racks when hot, plus some really cool recipe ideas! Extra bonus - the oven turns on automatically when the handle locks closed, so you don't have to worry about accidentally turning it on!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R

customer_reviews.title: Longevity was short...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooker on December 7, 2019; it lasted until today (March 18,2020). Furthermore, this cooker wasn't used at high cooking temperatures; mainly used between 250-300 degrees F. The longevity was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cooking/baking, however, it's extremely noisy! It has a "vibration" in it and I can't find where it is coming from. I'm not quite sure I would buy it again due to the noise. The one I had before this was a lot quieter.
customer_reviews.author: kb2u

customer_reviews.title: Better than hallogen models
customer_reviews.text: This works well and should last much better than the halogen lamp type. I have an old oven of this type that just won't die, but I bought this for when it finally does. While this is an updated and better looking oven, the business part looks about the same. Another advantage of this type over halogen, is more even cooking without the intense radiant heat burning the tops of food before the lower part cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Mikenwa

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 2+ years
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these over 7 years or so. We use it at least once a day as our primary oven (rather than having to heat up our range oven - which is much slower and costs more) They work great for about 2 years then short out and stop working. However, for the cost it’s easy enough to replace.
customer_reviews.author: MGfromCAN

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazing. Its really quiet, and it cooks food fast at a lower temperature than our gas oven. Especially useful when we want to just cook a single pie or something because then we dont have to preheat the entire gas oven.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T

customer_reviews.title: It Did NOT Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed because it only lasted 6 months. It has the lights on but not heating up anymore. We used it everyday because it’s convenient to heat up food. I cook bacon in it. We’ve had about 3 NuWaves in the past, which lasted for about 3 years each. My husband decided to try this because it’s cheaper and we used to have a turbo broiler before the Nuwave.
customer_reviews.author: Alphonso Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and clean.  Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh I love this thing. We live in a tiny efficiency where we have very little room to create a kitchen. This thing does pretty much it all. I could make soup, a whole chicken, grill steaks, chicken wings. Quick wipe on the lid and quick wash of glass bowl, bam you're done. Highly recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: A VERY SATISFIED CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: A great oven & very easy to clean. I put a glass pie plate in the bowl to catch any drippings or just put the bowl in the dishwasher. I’ve cooked everything in it from peach cobbler to turkey patties to toasted bread. I tried an air fries & couldn’t stand the constant cleanup. Plus it is so beautiful sitting on my kitchen cabinet. I’m 86 yrs of age & highly recommend it for great grandmothers who hate to COOK and CLEANUP!! Barbara
customer_reviews.author: barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: One of those “glad I bought” items.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two so far, I use this convection oven nearly every day. The big glass bowl allows you to see your food cooking right in front of you. I recommend lining the bottom with aluminum foil to make cleaning a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: IC-IT

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: Omg, you need this in your life!! This thing is awesome. You do NOT need to preheat this like you would an oven. You just put your food in, set the timer and temperature, and watch it cook. I've dove chicken, fish, tater tots, fries, and meatballs. It. Is. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Oyama Turbo Oven is all I need in the kitchen. Cook all food quick, easy to use, looks great, and is cheap here at  Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, Great for all around kichen. Oyama Turbo Oven is all I need in the kitchen. Cook all food quick, easy to use, looks great, and it is very cheap here at Amazon. I already cooked chicken ( whole, wings or leg's) in it, potatoes, veggies, meat, pizza, all come up very good and teste better. It Cook without heating in the kitchen. It is easy to clean and has self clean. I just love this Oyama Turbo Oven. Very great.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use - Great For Indoor Barbecue
customer_reviews.text: I love the Oyama oven. Great for cooking on multi levers. Bottom layer meat and on top vegetables. To be honest the only problem is cleaning, wipe it down each time and go on.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Wabeke

customer_reviews.title: buy this oven!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this oven and so far I love it. I had the Sharper Image version for about six months before it quit for no reason. The Oyama cooks as well as the S.I. dud and costs about a third as much. I also like the fact that there is no bulb to explode and spoil your meal and mood. Only had it for a short time but I really like it. It cooks a little slower than the S.I. but I like that because the food doesn't scorch on top without the halogen bulb and I can cook at a higher temp. without worrying about the food burning on top.
customer_reviews.author: Crumidan45

customer_reviews.title: Good Nu Wave Replacement
customer_reviews.text: It works about as good as my old NuWave. The grill that comes with it is too small though. AND the actual grill bars are spread too far apart. Food falls thru it. I bought a replacement grill that has less openings and is a tad but bigger. Works better. As far as the actual cooking goes, it works just as good as my Nu Wave. The glass is heavy but easy to clean. My NuWave's dome broke and it cost just as much to replace as this entire unit cost. No brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frilot

customer_reviews.title: Great for reheating pizza
customer_reviews.text: Set it and forget it! Forget crockpots, this is my go-to for lazy cooking and reheating food. Great for reheating pizza, fries, fried items. My favorite thing to cook using this Convection oven is thighs and drumsticks. It will leave the outside crispy and the inside juicy and tender.
customer_reviews.author: Bill V.

customer_reviews.title: Love our turbo broiler!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for years. Works great. Love me some turbo broiled whole chicken! When I use my oven it tends to dry out the meat. With this guy, it makes the skin all crispy and yet leaves the meat moist. Frees up the oven so I can cook other things simultaneously. Great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tulipohare

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for one person, instead of heating up the oven. heats, cooks, thaws. This is second one. The first shattered after a year probably because of repeated exposure to high temps. Hope this one last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love to cook again!
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my Oyama TRO-110 Turbo convection oven a few days ago and I love cooking with it. The food cooks quickly and has an amazing taste.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: No EMF's and food taste better/more nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven some time ago, but it's still running well and cooking delicious foods without having to worry about dangerous EMFs of microwave cooking or nutrition being robbed from the food. Not to mention, that food cooks fast and taste better. The timer makes sure you don't burn things as well. It comes with a 'thaw setting', really helpful. Love this oven. Buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Best Convection oven I've ever owned period
customer_reviews.text: Best Convection oven I've ever owned period! It doesn't have the useless oven light integrated into most convection ovens which easily burns out thus rendering the unit useless... This machine has worked reliably for over a year with no issues... I have purchased several of these ovens and trust me this has been the most reliable.... I would highly recommend this to anyone contemplating on buying a convection oven...
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: I love my little Oyama oven
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Oyama oven. I have already used it more than 50 times and all the electronics have held up just fine. It is very easy to clean as well - soak the bowl and rack in the sink and whoosh-whoosh it's sparkling clean again. I liked the product so much that I ordered one for my cousin's wife and she loves it too. My only criticism is that I wish the instructions were a little more explicit, but I suppose all that I need to do is go to the library for a convection cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wernick

customer_reviews.title: Works well but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased June 2016 and stopped working August 2017 after the warranty expired. Used everyday, multiple times a day. It no longer heats up. The fan still works. Luckily, I also purchased an extended warranty from Asurion for $5. Called them and got a full refund in a gift card within mins. Will be purchasing another brand going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Good quality convection oven
customer_reviews.text: A very reliable oven. I’ve bought many before but this one is the best. Usually last me 2-3 years with moderate use or longer with minimal use and how it’s maintained.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lao

customer_reviews.title: It is well-built
customer_reviews.text: I bought another convection cooker and this one has a thicker cord, the bowl seems to be better made, and there's an extra rack plus a cookbook. And the price was reasonable. It arrived 2 days after ordering and I cooked steaks that evening with it. Am thinking of buying a second one to cook veggies while the chicken is roasting. What I love about these convection cookers is that they don't smoke up the kitchen even while broiling steaks...no smoke alarm going off either.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the pice
customer_reviews.text: We just started using this oven, but so far we are very pleased with it. It's very well made and cooks food great. It's nice to be able to cook something without heating up the whole house by using a standard oven. This oven is especially great for cooking hot wings. It makes the wings very crispy as if they were deep fried.
customer_reviews.author: EMC24

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my Mother. She fell in love with me afterwords! lol My Mom loved it so much. By the way, my Mom is a great cook. She spends hours in the kitchen and she knows what is a good cooker from her profound experience in cooking. I am very happy that she loved it. This is why I bought two more items of this product, one for me and the other to send it as a gift to someone else ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Abdulelah Bawazir

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and less time for me in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boys, each of them live it. So easy to use and less time for me in the kitchen. Much more healthier. Just the bottom seem like it would break easy, I just don't lift it with the glass bowl in it. I love the fact that you can just lift it off the bottom and wash. Makes it so much easier. Great purchase! No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Jozieleigh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 8 months. Used it only a couple times a week to heat up food. Blows warm air but there is no more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain and performer!
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive, great item for cooking; like the idea of being able to see thru the glass. Get the accessory Deluxe package along with it to expand your options.
customer_reviews.author: G. Baron

customer_reviews.title: Oyama TRO-110Turbo Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: This oven worked great when it worked. It only worked for 7 months than quite. Overall rating 1 star. Consumer has to pay shipping to return for warranty. Should have done my homework.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W. Ermler

customer_reviews.title: It keeps an even temp and I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for baking polymer clay. It keeps an even temp and I am happy with it. The little red lock was broken off when I got it, I think it should be designed better. But I am not using it in a household with children and the rest of the unit is works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good countertop oven
customer_reviews.text: Love it! we don't have to heat up the whole kitchen with the oven to cook chicken tenders or fries. Makes whole chickens and can use for many meals.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: We love ours, especially for the holidays, turkey, and all, and then theirs all that chicken, and steak, yummy. Just the right flavor, no grease just great taste.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. The only thing missing is a hinged lid. Having to worry about taking the lid off and placing securely somewhere without getting burned is cumbersome but a very good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: this works great and i love it
customer_reviews.text: this works great and i love it. i previously had only nu wave ovens (3 total) and my first one lasted a long time and the last two didnt even last a year so im glad i bought this and its only a third of the price of a nuwave. thank you
customer_reviews.author: dianna six

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: Quite good. For the price you cannot beat it. I think it was only $43 with free shipping and. I had to watch a YouTube video to figure out how to make it turn on and what you do is flip the handle back and then it will turn on the heat. All these tabletop for a really good idea because they save on energy and they cook fast
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: it is easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven.I used it 2 times every month since I got it.But it is out of work today! I was so disappointed ,it hasn't been used so long after I got it .It is less then 3 month.
customer_reviews.author: Xc

customer_reviews.title: Loved being able to cook meat and veggies last summer ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved being able to cook meat and veggies last summer without heating up the kitchen, and when I move out of this apartment I won't have to clean the oven. I went to the thrift store looking for pans and racks that might fit, and actually found a second turbo oven (different brand, same basic design) and I run them both simultaneously quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Magi Elle

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for one I’ve had for years. Love it!!! I use it for almost every meal. No need to defrost meats. Makes my life so much easier after a long day of work.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: NO adequate users manual came with my new oven.
customer_reviews.text: Where can I get a proper, detailed user manual to learn to use my new Turbo Convection Oven? The small booklet which came with the oven is useless. Thanks for your reply. CBCV
customer_reviews.author: C. B. C. V.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - product is noisy !
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Sept 11 and have used it three times since then. On our 2nd use, it produced a loud noise while heating. Disappointed on this product!
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product at less than half the price of a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at less than half the price of a newave oven. I Will recommend this product.It is big enough to cook a large meal and the quality and packaging was better than i expected. Very well maid and cooks faster than conventional oven. Very goods for healthy eating.More energy efficient than electric oven or toaster oven. Fast warming.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product. It cooks chicken and meat in less ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. It cooks chicken and meat in less time. The oven doesn't heat up the entire kitchen, uses less electric, and is so easy to clean. The only "complaint" I have is that it is not really all that great for making French fries. But overall, it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Cost  one third less than air oven
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this air fryer for 20 years . I always have 2 . I use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: irven duguay

customer_reviews.title: Broke down in 2-3 weeks with light home use
customer_reviews.text: This item, the Oyama Convection Oven stopped working within 2-3 weeks. The fan doesn't work anymore. It heats up, gets hot but no fan. Also, the minute dial, the timer had to be cranked up to 10 min. just to ever get it going. One just could not set it up for 2 minutes, it always had to go past the 5-minute mark at least. I had high hopes for this oven but it just did not deliver. I wish I could return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bogi

customer_reviews.title: Yumey Yumey, good food get in my tummy..
customer_reviews.text: Absolute the best cooking item I've ever bought. Everything I've cooked so far turn out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Big Boss oil-less fryer. After 8-10 uses, I am very disappointed in its performance. Food takes almost twice as long to cook. If I had a do-over I’d spend the extra money and go with the Big Boss.
customer_reviews.author: Ferenti

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky to keep on the countertop at all times, but it's easy to use and clean, works great. Fit quite a lot of wings using just one rack. Next time will try filling both up and see how long it takes. Browned nicely all around, juicy.
customer_reviews.author: dilite

customer_reviews.title: BET THING TO HAVE FOR A SINGLE MAN
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT TO HAVE ON THE COUNTER, COOKING MADE EASY!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: I love that my food is not dried out.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to cook healthier meals for my family. Purchasing this was a major sacrifice but to help make healthier meals for my disable mother, I had to and so far I feel it was worth it. I am not sure and not saying that this is the best product out there but being a former Flavor wave Turbo Oven user, I am more satisfied with this product. So this product is meeting the need of my family.
customer_reviews.author: The Voice of a Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is better than my last air turbo oven! I love that it cleans itself!
customer_reviews.author: catlover

customer_reviews.title: Item died after about 18 moths.
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this Oyama oven for fast, healthy cooking. Sadly while cooking bacon, the glass surrounding the top cracked and crumpled into a thousand pieces. I am ordering a new one.
customer_reviews.author: peggy holloman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My oven often set off the alarm when my food is only halfway cooked cause the smoke detector in my apartment is right next to it so I got one to use instead. Works as intended and is easy to clean unlike my oven.
customer_reviews.author: ChongLao

customer_reviews.title: works great! I like that it's not a halogen bulb ...
customer_reviews.text: works great! I like that it's not a halogen bulb so the heating element should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic to cook with
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic to cook with. Just keep an eye on your food as this cooks quicker then your normal oven. I usually cook at 50'F to 100'F cooler to prevent burning.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E

customer_reviews.title: Measure first, this thing is huge
customer_reviews.text: Really large - I should have measured first. It does a decent job replacing a microwave. Both frame feet were cracked, but I didn't bother returning. Will use until it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: PRM in Reno

customer_reviews.title: This countertop oven is a lifesaver! Since I received ...
customer_reviews.text: This countertop oven is a lifesaver! Since I received my first one as a gift from my dad about 15 years ago, I have purchased about 20 of these. I've gifted them to every family member, from my aunts in Trinidad and Tobago (I have 8 aunts) to my sisters (2 sisters) and my kids (2 kids). Plus, when mine breaks, I immediately replace it. I refuse to be without one.
customer_reviews.author: Charmain Page-Walthrus

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this kitchen appliance a lot. It does exactly what it advertises. Very easy to clean and delivers well cooked meats, etc. Yep, I'd recommend this convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon DBCat

customer_reviews.title: Great for small meals & no pre-heating!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one in lifetime! Found one similar to this about 20 years ago and I have been single and cooking for 1 or 2 people I love it.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY LEE DOWLING

product_meta.title: Oyama TRO-110C Turbo Convection Oven, 12 L, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteOYAMA Turbo Convection Oven. Cook healthier meals by using super heated circulating air to cook foods within their own juices. Now you can broil, bake, roast and grill quickly with just one appliance. Whether roasting a full chicken or grilling a steak, each meal will cook to perfection without burning because this oven cooks only with super heated air. See your meals cook right before your eyes in the impact and high temperature resistant 10.5 liter glass cooking container. Comes with a built-in timer and temperature selection dials for cooking convenience.
feature_bullets: Able to Bake, Grill, Steam or Roast
12 liter tempered heat resistant glass cooking bowl provides ample cooking space for a variety of foods
Separate dials for setting temperature and cooking time

2 Wire cooking racks, plate tong and instruction manual with recipes included.The handle on the lid works as a safety mechanism,if thelid is not on properly or the lid is off the oven,it will automatically turn off
Baking up to 482 degrees F/250 degrees C

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,367 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
